# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This item is not just any product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or needs. I am offering this product to you for $125, reflecting its true worth and the benefits it offers. I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
